bio:
I write content that other people want to read, I write words that will make them cry or make them laugh, and sometimes words that I hope will change the world for the better.100 % original and 100% fluffy free. 

As a tri-lingual writer for print and web who lived and worked for many years in the US, UK and Canada, I have 15 years of experience and I work with media companies and corporations on a wide scale. PR, informational texts, brochures, web copy, sales copy, magazine articles – you name it! I have also written and published 3 business books. 

I was an editor/writer at one of Scandinavia’s largest global publishing houses. I have also worked with a US company as a sales copy writer for 9 years before I became a freelance. 

I am easy to work with, fast and accurate. If you are looking for a really professional and passionate writer, you should hire me today!

Are you looking to automate your reporting process and save valuable time?  My skills include (but are NOT limited to...):  
• Excel Automation 
• CSV Manipulation and Parsing 
• Automated Report Generation or Mailing 
• Dashboards to Analyse data

If you have a suitable project to propose to me, don't hesitate to get in touch. I take pride in my work and will strive to exceed your expectations.

abstrac: LegalTech Expert - Litigation Management | Legal Spend Lean Audit | Legal Invoicing
bio:
Siva is the founder and proprietor of LexFriend. He has more than 15 years of experience in providing legal, technology and consulting services for US law firms, corporate legal departments and insurance claims departments.

He is a tech-savvy lawyer with significant experience in the fields of Enterprise Legal Management (ELM), Litigation Management, Electronic Legal Invoicing, Legal Bill Review and Legal Data Analytics.

Siva’s expertise includes US Legal Research, Litigation Spend Management, Contract Management and e-Procurement for Professional Services. This experience, borne of significant work in the context of (among others), Contract Review & Negotiation, Legal Bill Review & Audit, Insurance Defense, Healthcare (Medicaid & Medicare), Personal Injury Law Suits, Tribal Trust Litigation, Corporate & Securities Law; as well as extensive Discovery Management experience.

Previously Siva was the CEO and Director of Business Development of LSG US LLC., an ELM software and Legal Bill Review service provider. During his tenure with LSG, he was one of the key strategic advisors and consultants for implementing ELM systems and legal analytics for clients.

Prior to LSG, Siva was Director and India Operations Head of Atlas Legal Research.

Siva is based in Bangalore and holds a law degree from the University of Mysore.

I prefer taking up high-end LegalTech consulting work for US clients.  I am flexible with my billing terms and I prefer negotiating the project price on a case-to-case basis. Considering my location (India) and time zone difference, my preferred mode of communication would be email & Skype. My real time availability would be between 7am to 10am EST.
